data.message: @facebook I would like to make a comment about a new feature. When I click to write a post, the facebook page goes dark and only that little post box is lit up. Because I often use my computer without a light in the room the sudden change in brightness makes it difficult for me to see. I really dislike that feature and hope you get rid of it.

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Mary. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something specific we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: on.fb.me/1N2bhYs. -Monica

Facebook  RIGHT... you are very good in improving.... here check this screenshot out pls... you have ppl blocked for much less as threatening to kill others http://www.fotos-hochladen.net/view/zekikulkul09n7wg35rl.png

.. not sure what ever happened to the term... "keep it simple".. things on FB use to be so simple a few years back.. I am all into change, but don't like the idea that I never know what to expect when I log into FB.. and now recently, FB changed the name on my page because it was a nick name (uncle pete) and not on any official documents... really....
